website_summaries.verdict: While it can be difficult to set up, this option offers a strong build and quality imaging.
pros: Features a soft blue LED light
High image quality that's great for identifying difficult fingerprints
cons: Doesn’t ship with software or documentation, so you’re on your own incorporating it into your system

customer_reviews.title: Great solid product for business...
customer_reviews.text: Conclusion: Fantastic product, great quality Pros + Great looks + Blue light won't bother your eyes + Long lasting if you don't stratch the clear window where you put your finger + We had a software designed for its predecessor, the 4000B and we just bought this one and plugged it in and works great without any software, SDK or driver update needed. Cons - Remember you need a special software to use this hardware, because it requires you to install the Digital Persona drivers, and in the fingerprint software to use the special Digital Persona SDK, so make sure your software can use this model. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazn Buyr

customer_reviews.title: Not plug and play
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated it does not come with software and will not work on Windows 10 without drivers. I would provide more detail but my earlier attempt to do so was shot down. If you want the drivers be prepared top do a lot of searching and spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works in linux
customer_reviews.text: I'm on manjaro (arch based) linux with a gnome DM and it works out of the box. It's a bit bulky, but it can be tucked away in the desk out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Even Come with Drivers
customer_reviews.text: This piece of hardware is not plug-and-play with Windows; it would not work with Hello Fingerprint. It needs drivers, but the manufacturer does not include them in the box! Nor can working drivers be found on the Web after a couple hours of searching. If you are an individual, don't waste your time buying this. This biometric device would probably only benefit a business that already has purchased the proprietary software from the manufacturer, and it seems they also need an account with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Works great with TimeClockMTS software
customer_reviews.text: Works great with TimeClockMTS software. Scans very quickly. The TimeClockMTS software has the drivers built in the software to run this fingerprint scanner. You don't install any software at all when you plug it into the USB port, don't allow Windows to install any. Instead, inside the software, there's an option in the menu to install the driver. This scanner has a good, solid feel to it, and a rubberized bottom so it won't slide easily on a clean surface. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Not working for all windows 10
customer_reviews.text: No tech support available for this, I wish they should provide drivers for custom apps to integrate.
customer_reviews.author: Appaji Sirangi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for both development and business.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect bio-metric device for fingerprint scanning but you need to buy SDK too. "(65907-E01-300) U.are.U SDK Developer Kit (Software Only) — $149.00". we use it to develop a software "Patients information system". Purpose: retrieve patient information by using his fingerprint.
customer_reviews.author: Almansour

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fingerprint Reader
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item form Amazon time ago, and i can tell you that it is a great product, it is much better an accurate that the old 4000 and 4000b readers. Also the look of the blue led makes it look much techie and nice. An excellent product, if your software is compatible with this reader it is a much better option that the older models.
customer_reviews.author: antovasa

customer_reviews.title: work good for what we needed but it comes with no ...
customer_reviews.text: work good for what we needed but it comes with no software. had to find it on the internet. you need to be tech smart to get the software.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Basic, no frills, Finger Print Reader
customer_reviews.text: It's a finger print reader either it works or it doesn't. I have these deployed for all different systems and they are under heavy use. They're not bullet proof however and can be real finicky. Works 90% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mando's World

customer_reviews.title: neither one work at all would not purchase again bought ...
customer_reviews.text: neither one work at all would not purchase again bought 2 of them for 2 work stations and will not recognize any of my employee's prints!
customer_reviews.author: captk

customer_reviews.title: Horrific interface
customer_reviews.text: The good: Use the device to login into windows and websites, that's it! The Bad: Roboform, passware and any other software platforms that can utilize biometric hardware is totally out of luck and useless when trying to integrate the device. This means: Your stuck with their two year old software, for which they have no plans on upgrading anytime soon. It's like using a mouse, but only for Microsoft written programs, good luck with any Adobe, Google or Apple products! If you want to integrate your hardware into any other software, learn programming and ohh, by the way, have the source code for the software you want to use it with. Jerks!
customer_reviews.author: Nils H Nehrenheim

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Great little piece of hardware. Build quality is awesome. Does not work with Windows 10. Won't plug and play out of the box and no drivers are available.
customer_reviews.author: CTarbet

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid biometric scanner
customer_reviews.text: We have installed a few of these at customer sites and all of them have performed flawlessly. The only hangup we've experienced is when the scanner is power-starved. We had a scanner plugged into a non-powered USB hub, along with a keyboard, mouse, bar code scanner, and thumb drive. The unit would occasionally 'fall asleep', for lack of a better term. Plugging the scanner directly into a port on the computer solved the problem. As other reviewers have noted, no software is included. This was a non-issue for me - downloaded the SDK and everything was fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Glisan

customer_reviews.title: Holds up with a lot of use
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great. Used at least 50 times a day
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lamb

customer_reviews.title: It works. this is a business product that might ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. this is a business product that might require drivers from a vendor, do not buy this if you are a consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: My bf bought this for a Child ID program he runs with a local middle school, and so far, it's worked wonderfully. It's a little small, so it has issues picking up the full fingerprint on an adult hand, and sometimes you have to do it multiple times, but other than that, it's durable and doesn't lose connection.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but!!!
customer_reviews.text: This reader works very well. I have been using it with a Child ID program which my Lodge provides as a service to the public free if charge. No records are kept by us so as to prevent any privacy issues. I have one caveat however. It is nearly impossible to find a driver for this device. If I hadn't had a friend who had a similar device and had the driver, I would have been dead in the water. Why a manufacturer would sell a device with no driver provided is beyond me.

customer_reviews.title: Will require software that is not included for $800!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unit feels really solidly built but when I spoke to a rep at DigitalPersona, this unit is intended for large enterprises with multiple employees and very specific and sophisticated biometric security. If you are looking for a simple password or login fingerprint reader like the old Microsoft one that is no longer supported by Windows 7, then this is NOT the one you want. Try the Eikon Solo. It includes the needed software to make it run and is about $25.

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL SCAM!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT FOR INDIVIDUALS, IT IS FOR CORPORATIONS. YOU BUY THE READER AND THATS ALL. NO SOFTWARE WITH THIS PRODUCTS. WHEN YOU GO TO THE COMPANYY'S WEBSITE YOU HAVE TO REQUEST A QOUTE FROM THEM AND TELL THEM HOW BIG YOUR COMPANY IS SO THEY CAN FIGURE THE LICENSES. I DID SOME RESEARCH ON THE WEB AND THEY APPARENTLY HAVE GONE OUT OF THE PERSONAL READER SOFTWARE. I FOUND AND OLDER VERSION BUT IF YOU ARE RUNNING A 64 BIT SYSTEM YOUR JUST OUT THE INVESTMENT. VERY MISLEADING AND THE COMPANY WONT BE HONEST MAYBE AMAZON WILL QUITE LETTING PEOPLE SELL THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: This item is obsolete.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon should require that anyone who sells obsolete items should post on the item's page in big bold red letters: "Obsolete Technology. Buy At Your Own Risk." I got taken for over $90 and that was money I didn't have to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Winger-Ziskey

product_meta.title: Digital Persona 88003-001U.are.u 4500 Reader 70" Cable
product_meta.description: DigitalPersona products utilize optical fingerprint scanning technology for superior image quality and product reliability. The combination of a U.are.U 4500 Fingerprint Reader with the DigitalPersona Identity Engine produces an unmatched ability to recognize even the most difficult fingerprints. This product does not come with CD, software or manuals, Only the device is shipped.
feature_bullets: Target Applications - Desktop PC security, Mobile PCs, Custom applications
Blue LED - soft, cool blue glow fits into any environment; doesn't compete in low light environments
Small form factor - conserves valuable desk space
Rugged construction - high-quality metal casing weighted to resist unintentional movement
This product does not come with CD, software or manuals, Only the device is shipped.
Pixel resolution: 512 dpi(average x, y over the scan area)
Scan capture area: 14.6 mm (nom. width at center) 18.1 mm (nom. length)
Reader size (approximate) 65 mm x 36 mm x 15.56 mm
Compatible with USB 1.0,1.1 and 2.0 (Full Speed) specifications and No software included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars210 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
